entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uxbridge 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
